snippet: Mitt Romney called the numbers “a sad reminder that the economy is at a virtual standstill,” but the White House cited the report as further evidence that the nation’s economy is recovering.
lead_paragraph: Mitt Romney called the numbers “a sad reminder that the economy is at a virtual standstill,” but the White House cited the report as further evidence that the nation’s economy is recovering.

headline.seo: Jobs Report Offers Little Change in Dynamic Between Obama and Romney
headline.main: Economic Data Offers Little Change in Dynamic Between Obama and Romney
headline.print_headline: Jobs Report Offers Little Change in Dynamic Between Obama and Romney
